BT.managers

Class JoinEdgeDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.managers.JoinEdgeDrawer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CDJoinEdgeDrawer, PNJoinEdgeDrawer, UCJoinEdgeDrawer

    public class JoinEdgeDrawer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that can draw triangles and diamonds at the end of lines. This class is basic class for drawing additional components, such as traingles or strings at precise location.
    Author:
    Karel Hala
